scripts.clean: pnpm exec rm -rf node_modules & pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules
scripts.db:start: dotenv -c development -- sh -c ' cross-env PROJECT_NAME=$PROJECT_NAME && docker compose -p $PROJECT_NAME -f docker/shared/docker-compose.db.yml up --build -d'
scripts.db:stop: dotenv -c development -- sh -c ' cross-env PROJECT_NAME=$PROJECT_NAME && docker compose -p $PROJECT_NAME -f docker/shared/docker-compose.db.yml down --remove-orphans'
scripts.docker:dev: dotenv -c development -- sh -c ' cross-env PROJECT_NAME=$PROJECT_NAME && docker compose -p $PROJECT_NAME -f docker/development/docker-compose.yml up --build'
scripts.docker:up: dotenv -c production -- sh -c ' cross-env PROJECT_NAME=$PROJECT_NAME && docker compose -p $PROJECT_NAME -f docker/production/docker-compose.yml up --build'
scripts.docker:down: dotenv -e .env -c -- sh -c ' cross-env PROJECT_NAME=$PROJECT_NAME && docker compose -p $PROJECT_NAME -f docker/development/docker-compose.yml down --remove-orphans'
scripts.docker:remove: dotenv -e .env -c -- sh -c ' cross-env PROJECT_NAME=$PROJECT_NAME && docker compose -p $PROJECT_NAME -f docker/development/docker-compose.yml down rm -vfs'
